description: Ty Mitchell is busy writing his to-do list when his roommate, a heavily tattooed Brian Michaels walks in. Ty is feeling extra horny and wants Brian's big dick inside his ass! He writes it on the board and tells Brian it has to happen because it's been written down. Brian, feeling horny himself, obliges and lets Ty get on his knees so he can slobber all over his cock before he gets it in his eager asshole.
title: Pass The Bottom Part 1
